"use client" import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { Loader2, CheckCircle, PlusCircle, AlertCircle, ShoppingBag, DollarSign, Coffee, Clock, TrendingUp, Users, ArrowUpRight, BookOpen, CreditCard, Settings, } from "lucide-react" const DashboardSection = ({ title, children, icon }) => (

) const Content = ({ selectedPage }) => { const [orders, setOrders] = useState([]) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false) const [error, setError] = useState(null) const [servedQuantities, setServedQuantities] = useState({}) const [newOrderName, setNewOrderName] = useState("") const loadOrders = async () => { setLoading(true) try { // Simulate API call setTimeout(() => { const mockOrders = [ { OrderID: 1, DishID: 101, TableID: "A1", DishName: "Burger", RemainingQuantity: 2 }, { OrderID: 2, DishID: 102, TableID: "B2", DishName: "Pizza", RemainingQuantity: 1 }, { OrderID: 3, DishID: 103, TableID: "C3", DishName: "Pasta", RemainingQuantity: 3 }, ] setOrders(mockOrders) setLoading(false) }, 500) } catch (err) { setError("Failed to load orders.") setLoading(false) } } useEffect(() => { if (selectedPage === "order") { loadOrders() } }, [selectedPage]) const handleQuantityChange = (orderID, dishID, quantity) => { setServedQuantities((prev) => ({ ...prev, [`${orderID}-${dishID}`]: quantity, })) } const served = async (orderID, dishID, quantity) => { // Simulate API call setOrders((prev) => prev.map((order) => { if (order.OrderID === orderID && order.DishID === dishID) { return { ...order, RemainingQuantity: order.RemainingQuantity - quantity } } return order }), ) setServedQuantities((prev) => { const { [`${orderID}-${dishID}`]: removed, ...rest } = prev return rest }) } const addOrder = () => { // Simulate adding an order alert(`Adding order: ${newOrderName}`) setNewOrderName("") } switch (selectedPage) { case "dashboard": return case "user": return } /> case "menu": return } /> case "order": return (
}> {error && (
{error}
)} {loading ? (

)} )} }>
setNewOrderName(e.target.value)} placeholder="Enter order name" className="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-transparent" />
) case "payment": return } /> case "settings": return } /> default: return } } export default Content
